import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faUsers, faComments, faCalendarAlt, faImages, faCalendar,faSignOutAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import '../styles/Sidebar.css'; const Sidebar = ({ onSidebarItemClick }) => { return (
  • onSidebarItemClick('event')}> Event
  • onSidebarItemClick('users')}> Users
  • onSidebarItemClick('forums')}> Forums
  • onSidebarItemClick('events')}> Events
  • onSidebarItemClick('gallery')}> Gallery
  • Logout
); }; export default Sidebar;
